author: Firdose Moonda
description: South Africa are set for a long tour of England, by the end of which they could have the ICC Champions Trophy and an improved chance at taking the No. 1 Test ranking
title: South Africa depart on a long journey chasing trophies

author: Joseph White
description: General Motors Co plans to quit selling vehicles in India by the end of this year and will sell operations in South Africa, the latest steps in a strategy of focusing cash and engineering effort on fewer, more profitable markets.
title: GM will cut operations in India, South Africa

author: ESPNcricinfo staff
description: Chris Woakes insists he'll be fit and ready to resume his international duties for England against South Africa next week, despite coming off the back of a draining maiden stint in the IPL
title: Woakes ready to take IPL form into Champions Trophy
